metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' or type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
	| order by Count desc
	| extend Rank = row_number()
	| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: EventLog
parameters.label: Event Log
parameters.query:
Event
| distinct EventLog
| order by EventLog asc

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| distinct RGName

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize Count=count() by strcat("EventID: ",tostring(EventID))
| sort by Count
content.title: Top 10 most repeated EventID

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize count() by ["Level"]=EventLevelName,["Rendered Description"]=RenderedDescription, EventID
| sort by count_
content.title: Top repeated events by Event Description

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| where '{EventLog:label}'=='All' or EventLog in ({EventLog})
| project EventLog,EventLevelName
| evaluate pivot(EventLevelName)
content.title: Windows Events - Summary

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| where EventLog == "{EventLogP}"
//| where '{EventLog:label}'=='All' or EventLog in ({EventLog})
| where EventID != 0
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, ({TimeRange:end}-{TimeRange:start})/100),EventLevelName
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Events count distribution

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
|  where EventLog == "{EventLogP}" and EventLevelName == "Error"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog, EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Error Events

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| where EventLog == "{EventLogP}" and EventLevelName == "Warning"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog,EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Warning Events

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| where EventLog == "{EventLogP}" and EventLevelName == "Information"
| summarize Count=count() by Computer, EventLog,EventLevelName
| sort by Count
content.title: Information Events

content.query:
Event
| extend RGName = tolower(split(_ResourceId, "/")[4])
| where RGName in ({ResourceGroup})
| where EventLog == "{EventLogP}" and EventLevelName == "{EventLevelName}" and Computer == "{Computer}" and EventID != 0
| project Computer, EventLog, ["Level"]=EventLevelName, ["Rendered Description"]=RenderedDescription,TimeGenerated, Source, ParameterXml, EventData, EventID, UserName, EventCategory
| sort by Computer, EventLog, ["Level"]
| extend Info="More info"
content.title: Event ID Description
